resources.string:
Welcome to TaskOrganiser (or Tasky). 

It is deigned to be a simple task and activity tool to aid those with limited memory for sequential tasks. 

On this screen you can set your name, a telephone number to send SMS messages and an option to globally allow (or not) SMS message sending, these are all optional. 

You can always return to the main task screen by clicking the app icon on the top left or using the menu on the top right. 

The Home button at the bottom of the screen will also navigate to the Home page of Tasks. 

The Back button at the bottom of the screen will move 'up' to a parent Task 

The tasks are divided into Actions and groups of Actions called Tasks. 

Each Action or Task can be 'ticked off' with a click once completed, and reverted with a left swipe. 

A clicked Task will open a page for its Actions. 

The Tasks and Actions can be created on the Edit screen, where they can be: 
	► Added (to the end of the current list) 
	► Deleted (left swipe) 
	► Re-ordered (drag and drop) 
	► Set the Task or Action type, text description and optional SMS 
	► The Undo button will undo all editing in the current Edit session 
	► The Done button will save and end the editing session, returning to the main Home screen
